page.title: 09RECREATION,FORT AUGUSTUS.
page.content: In the {Fort-Augustus }area, gardening is enjoyed more than any other outdoor activity.Just over half the people interviewed in a local survey spent part of their leisure time gardening. It was found that flower gardening was slightly more popular than vegetable gardening.Other outdoor activities enjoyed are golf , tennis , fishing , shinty and hillwalking. The most popular indoor activity was found to be television.Most of those interviewed watched television for more than ten hours a week. Other indoor activities enjoyed were badminton,darts,snooker,whist and bingo. When asked about facilities they would like to see in the area,a vast majority of people chose a swimming pool or a bowling green.
